name: 8Letters
description:
A game in which you score points by making words from a sliding puzzle of letters. The game is called 8Letters because the maximum sized word you can make consists of 8 letters. Heres a challenge: Try to get as many 8 letter words as you can!

How to play:

Click any letter opposite the blank tile to slide it into the blank space thereby producing words either horizontally or vertically, the latest word found will appear onscreen. Score more points by getting longer words. double your score by getting an 8 letter word.

Note:

This game is still in development so most likely contains bugs. The letters are also randomly placed at the start of the game so difficulty may vary on a per game basis
